Code For FoCo

Code For FoCo

May 27, 2016

Code for FoCo is a collaboration with the City of Fort Collins, Galvanize, and local developers to assist in the creation of community and non-profit websites and web applications.

Code for FoCo is a collaboration with the City of Fort Collins, Galvanize, and local developers to assist in the creation of community and non-profit websites and web applications.

Led by Jordan Majdolashrafi, we are a group that is not just building websites and applications, but growing an environment of transparency with local government, helping start-ups in need, and teaching people, students and children the fundamentals of programming, art, technology.

Please check out codeforfoco.org

I am excited to be a part of this process. Not only did I get to build the website, but I am excited to help develop new applications and technolgies to better the community.

Jeremy Roelfs
